alert.note: Alert for Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:10PM EST until February 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM EST FRIDAY FOR THE SOUTH FORK LICKING RIVER AT HEATH... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The South Fork Licking River at Heath. * WHEN...Until 515 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...At stages near 17 feet, some areas of Licking View Drive near Livingston Court are flooded. The soccer and baseball fields of Hobak Park are also flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1106 PM EST, The river stage at the South Fork Licking River at Heath is 15.9 feet. Minor flooding is forecast. - The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.9 feet early Friday morning. It will fall below flood stage later Friday morning. Flood stage is 16 feet. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Heath.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
